item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:11, topic:540681”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=659545.msg4410618#msg4410618 date=1393505645]

me on rune-server:

GameObject otherGate = null; for (GameObject object : player.getRegion().getGameObjects()) { if (object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() - 1 || object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() + 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() - 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() + 1) { for (int closedGateId : closedGateIds) { if (object.getDefinition().getId() == closedGateId) { otherGate = object; } } } } if (otherGate == null) return; GameObject referredOpeningGate = null; GameObject openingGate = null; if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() < gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) referredOpeningGate = otherGate; else if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() > gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) referredOpeningGate = gameObject; if (referredOpeningGate != null) { int openingIndex = 0; int otherIndex = 0; for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) { if (closedGateIds[i] == referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId()) { openingIndex = i; } } if (referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId() == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) { for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) { if (closedGateIds[i] == gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) { otherIndex = i; } } } else { for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) { if (closedGateIds[i] == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) { otherIndex = i; } } } GameObject otherOpenedGate = null; Location otherOpenedGateLocation = null; Location originalOpenedGateLocation = null; ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(gameObject); ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(otherGate); int rotation = 0; if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 0) rotation = 4; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 2) rotation = 1; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 3) rotation = 2; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 4) rotation = 3; if (rotation == 0) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); else if (rotation == 1) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); else if (rotation == 2) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); else if (rotation == 3) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); if (rotation == 0) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (rotation == 1) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (rotation == 2) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (rotation == 3) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); openingGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[openingIndex]), originalOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation); otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[otherIndex]), otherOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation); ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(openingGate); ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(otherOpenedGate); player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(openingGate); player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(otherOpenedGate); gatesPending.add(new GameObject[]{gameObject, otherGate, openingGate, otherOpenedGate}); World.getWorld().submit(new Event(60000) { @Override public void execute() { closeGate(gameObject); this.stop(); } }); // otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(openGateIds[index2], Location.create(player.getLocation().getX() - 1, player.getLocation().getY())) }

what the fuck[/quote]

Congratulations on posting yourself twice!

I think it’s because you quoted that he liked the system other than the looping.[/quote]
I never said he liked the system. :palm:

[quote=“Docent, post:38, topic:540681”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=659545.msg4414257#msg4414257 date=1395091689]

I released a version of mine it’s not amazing but I think it is more OO than this. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,659650.0.html

Oh yeah I have a question that might sound nooby but do you have to create each gate in the .xml file by hand or is there an automated way to do it? It seems ridiculously time consuming to add every single gate into that file.

it’s not a nooby question. But yes your correct you do have to add every gate into the xml file but only one object id you don’t have to do both object ids. I really don’t know if there is an automated way to do it and I don’t know enough about the RSPS to do that.

Mine is automated???
[/quote]

Well explain it please because I’ll need this to advance my xenorune project haha[/quote]
Read the code?

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:32, topic:540681”][quote author=Docent link=topic=659545.msg4414129#msg4414129 date=1395022332]
Would y’all like to get back to helping arham’s code?

See if this works, I combined some of the IF and ELSE statements.

public static void openGate(Player player, final GameObject gameObject) {
        GameObject otherGate = null;
        for (GameObject object : player.getRegion().getGameObjects()) {
            if (object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() - 1 || object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() + 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() - 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() + 1) {
                for (int closedGateId : closedGateIds) {
                    if (object.getDefinition().getId() == closedGateId) {
                        otherGate = object;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if (otherGate == null)
            return;
        GameObject referredOpeningGate = null;
        GameObject openingGate = null;
        if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() < gameObject.getDefinition().getId())
            referredOpeningGate = otherGate;
        else if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() > gameObject.getDefinition().getId())
            referredOpeningGate = gameObject;
        if (referredOpeningGate != null) {
            int openingIndex = 0;
            int otherIndex = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) {
                if (closedGateIds[i] == referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId()) {
                    openingIndex = i;
                }
            }
            if (referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId() == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) {
                for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) {
                    if (closedGateIds[i] == gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) {
                        otherIndex = i;
                    }
                }
            } else {
                for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) {
                    if (closedGateIds[i] == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) {
                        otherIndex = i;
                    }
                }
            }
            GameObject otherOpenedGate = null;
            Location otherOpenedGateLocation = null;
            Location originalOpenedGateLocation = null;
            ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(gameObject);
            ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(otherGate);
            int rotation = 0;
            if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 0)
                rotation = 4;
            else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 2)
                rotation = 1;
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
            else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 3)
                rotation = 2;
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
            else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 4)
                rotation = 3;
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
            if (rotation == 0)
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
            openingGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[openingIndex]), originalOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation);
            otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[otherIndex]), otherOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation);
            ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(openingGate);
            ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(otherOpenedGate);
            player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(openingGate);
            player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(otherOpenedGate);
            gatesPending.add(new GameObject[]{gameObject, otherGate, openingGate, otherOpenedGate});
            World.getWorld().submit(new Event(60000) {
                @Override
                public void execute() {
                    closeGate(gameObject);
                    this.stop();
                }
            });
            // otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(openGateIds[index2], Location.create(player.getLocation().getX() - 1, player.getLocation().getY()))
        }
    }

[/quote]
This is horrible please don’t use that. Also, you still are not following conventions with your if and else statements and the looks horrendous and uses no OO.[/quote]

How would you write this?

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:31, topic:540681”]Would y’all like to get back to helping arham’s code?

See if this works, I combined some of the IF and ELSE statements.

public static void openGate(Player player, final GameObject gameObject) { GameObject otherGate = null; for (GameObject object : player.getRegion().getGameObjects()) { if (object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() - 1 || object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() + 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() - 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() + 1) { for (int closedGateId : closedGateIds) { if (object.getDefinition().getId() == closedGateId) { otherGate = object; } } } } if (otherGate == null) return; GameObject referredOpeningGate = null; GameObject openingGate = null; if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() < gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) referredOpeningGate = otherGate; else if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() > gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) referredOpeningGate = gameObject; if (referredOpeningGate != null) { int openingIndex = 0; int otherIndex = 0; for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) { if (closedGateIds[i] == referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId()) { openingIndex = i; } } if (referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId() == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) { for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) { if (closedGateIds[i] == gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) { otherIndex = i; } } } else { for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) { if (closedGateIds[i] == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) { otherIndex = i; } } } GameObject otherOpenedGate = null; Location otherOpenedGateLocation = null; Location originalOpenedGateLocation = null; ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(gameObject); ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(otherGate); int rotation = 0; if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 0) rotation = 4; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 2) rotation = 1; originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 3) rotation = 2; originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 4) rotation = 3; originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); if (rotation == 0) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); openingGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[openingIndex]), originalOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation); otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[otherIndex]), otherOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation); ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(openingGate); ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(otherOpenedGate); player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(openingGate); player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(otherOpenedGate); gatesPending.add(new GameObject[]{gameObject, otherGate, openingGate, otherOpenedGate}); World.getWorld().submit(new Event(60000) { @Override public void execute() { closeGate(gameObject); this.stop(); } }); // otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(openGateIds[index2], Location.create(player.getLocation().getX() - 1, player.getLocation().getY())) } } [/quote]
This is horrible please don’t use that. Also, you still are not following conventions with your if and else statements and the looks horrendous and uses no OO.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Would y’all like to get back to helping arham’s code?

See if this works, I combined some of the IF and ELSE statements.

public static void openGate(Player player, final GameObject gameObject) {
        GameObject otherGate = null;
        for (GameObject object : player.getRegion().getGameObjects()) {
            if (object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() - 1 || object.getLocation().getX() == gameObject.getLocation().getX() + 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() - 1 || object.getLocation().getY() == gameObject.getLocation().getY() + 1) {
                for (int closedGateId : closedGateIds) {
                    if (object.getDefinition().getId() == closedGateId) {
                        otherGate = object;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if (otherGate == null)
            return;
        GameObject referredOpeningGate = null;
        GameObject openingGate = null;
        if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() < gameObject.getDefinition().getId())
            referredOpeningGate = otherGate;
        else if (otherGate.getDefinition().getId() > gameObject.getDefinition().getId())
            referredOpeningGate = gameObject;
        if (referredOpeningGate != null) {
            int openingIndex = 0;
            int otherIndex = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) {
                if (closedGateIds[i] == referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId()) {
                    openingIndex = i;
                }
            }
            if (referredOpeningGate.getDefinition().getId() == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) {
                for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) {
                    if (closedGateIds[i] == gameObject.getDefinition().getId()) {
                        otherIndex = i;
                    }
                }
            } else {
                for (int i = 0; i < closedGateIds.length; i++) {
                    if (closedGateIds[i] == otherGate.getDefinition().getId()) {
                        otherIndex = i;
                    }
                }
            }
            GameObject otherOpenedGate = null;
            Location otherOpenedGateLocation = null;
            Location originalOpenedGateLocation = null;
            ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(gameObject);
            ObjectManager.removeGlobalObject(otherGate);
            int rotation = 0;
            if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 0)
                rotation = 4;
            else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 2)
                rotation = 1;
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
            else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 3)
                rotation = 2;
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
            else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 4)
                rotation = 3;
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
            if (rotation == 0)
                otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
                originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ());
            openingGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[openingIndex]), originalOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation);
            otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(GameObjectDefinition.forId(openGateIds[otherIndex]), otherOpenedGateLocation, referredOpeningGate.getType(), rotation);
            ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(openingGate);
            ObjectManager.createGlobalObject(otherOpenedGate);
            player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(openingGate);
            player.getRegion().getGameObjects().add(otherOpenedGate);
            gatesPending.add(new GameObject[]{gameObject, otherGate, openingGate, otherOpenedGate});
            World.getWorld().submit(new Event(60000) {
                @Override
                public void execute() {
                    closeGate(gameObject);
                    this.stop();
                }
            });
            // otherOpenedGate = new GameObject(openGateIds[index2], Location.create(player.getLocation().getX() - 1, player.getLocation().getY()))
        }
    }

Read full topic

Also, from what I remember, 0 is the default position for objects…

You both tried correcting him and didn’t do a good job of it, [size=18pt]since in his context rotation[/size] seems to be from 1-4, not 0-3.

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:

Pure_:

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:19, topic:540681”]why u no use my 10line random system? hehehehe

/* * Opens the doors in a pseudo random direction We set the random to 3, * because java starts counting at 0 */ public void openDoorRandomDirection(int objectX, int objectY) { switch (Misc.random(3)) { case 0: Client.makeGlobalObject(objectX, objectY, 1533, 1, 0); Client.sM("Opened the door in North direction"); break; case 1: Client.makeGlobalObject(objectX, objectY, 1533, 2, 0); Client.sM("Opened the door in East direction"); break; case 2: Client.makeGlobalObject(objectX, objectY, 1533, 3, 0); Client.sM("Opened the door in West direction"); break; case 3: Client.makeGlobalObject(objectX, objectY, 1533, 4, 0); Client.sM("Opened the door in Sout direction"); break; } }
heheheheheh ehehehehehhe[/quote]
Why?

[code=java]

	public void openDoorRandomDirection(int objectX, int objectY) {
		Client.makeGlobalObject(objectX, objectY, 1533, Misc.random(3), 0);
	}[/code]

Don’t even see the point of the method…

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:17, topic:540681”]Cleaning up if statements isn’t about making the code faster it’s about making it easier to read. That lot is horrific. For a start, the first 9 lines you quoted can be done with something like this:

int rotation = referredOpeningGate.getRotation() > 0 ? referredOpeningGate.getRotation()-1 : 4;

I can’t even be bothered to clean up the rest of it, but surely it’s obvious you don’t need to keep making the same call to Location.create?![/quote]

Yeah, there is a pattern.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Cleaning up if statements isn’t about making the code faster it’s about making it easier to read. That lot is horrific. For a start, the first 9 lines you quoted can be done with something like this:

int rotation = referredOpeningGate.getRotation() > 0 ? referredOpeningGate.getRotation()-1 : 4;

I can’t even be bothered to clean up the rest of it, but surely it’s obvious you don’t need to keep making the same call to Location.create?!

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Hyperion] Gates (fences)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

X Entinity X:

he could use a switch statement for the rotation .

Bytecode on that is nearly identical, and there would be no optimizations made from using one.

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:13, topic:540681”]https://www.google.co.uk/search?q=programming+without+if+statements

Obviously you don’t have to avoid them completely (you could) but seriously if you have this many if-else statements you need to use a pattern.[/quote]

int rotation = 0; if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 0) rotation = 4; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 2) rotation = 1; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 3) rotation = 2; else if (referredOpeningGate.getRotation() == 4) rotation = 3; if (rotation == 0) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); else if (rotation == 1) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() + 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); else if (rotation == 2) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); else if (rotation == 3) originalOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getX() - 1, referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getY(), referredOpeningGate.getLocation().getZ()); if (rotation == 0) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (rotation == 1) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() + 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (rotation == 2) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getY() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ()); else if (rotation == 3) otherOpenedGateLocation = Location.create(originalOpenedGateLocation.getX() - 1, originalOpenedGateLocation.getY(), originalOpenedGateLocation.getZ());
How would you use a pattern for that? You could cut down on the number of branches, but there still needs to be some kind of conditional here

Read full topic
